definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Methods Conformal mapping and elliptical function are used to investigate the anti-plane problem.
sentences.chinese: 方法利用保角變換及其橢圓函數進行研究。

sentences.english: The approach of realization of the elliptic function complementary filter has been given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了橢圓函數互補濾波器的實現條件。

sentences.english: The paper discusses the establishment foundation of Jacobi elliptic function theory.
sentences.chinese: 討論雅可比橢圓函數理論建立的理論基礎。
